attributes.action: reduce the number of unecessary managers and bureacracy within the nhs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There appears to be a proliferation of unecessary managers within the NHS over the past few years. For example- referrals to secondary care- used to be send letter to hospital, consultant see letter appt booked. Now - try to use choose and book- doesn't work ? why- send letter- goes to referral management centre- triaged in GPwSI- appt given- pt seen - assessed as needing neurosurgical appt- this is where you originally sent the referral. WHY, WHY, WHY.  and this is only one process, what about all the others

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
